title: Crude Oil
description: Dana Devlin was still recovering from a messy divorce following an even messier marriage. When her sister Jodi sent her to Enchantor Key for a weekend of relaxing and unwinding, the last thing she expected was a Meet Your Mate event. And the last person she expected to see what sexy hunk Max Hollister, a divorce attorney about whom she secretly fantasised. Touch was enough to turn her on, but when he brought out his special oil, she was lost to an erotic adventure.
author: Desiree Holt
